channel.title: Project Phatscape
channel.description:
[b][i][u]~~ Server is still going through updates!! ~~ [/u][/i][/b]
[u][b]Website:[/b][/u] www.phatkillerz.net.ms/
Soon To be updates :::
[ul][li]Add Fremmy Rings (with stats)[/li] [li]Remove rares shop[/li] [li]Add Npc's[/li] [li]Add Drops[/li][/ul]
~MORE TO COME :)~
[u][b]Npc's And Drops:[/b][/u]
[ul][li]San Tojalon[/li][/ul]
Hp- 150 Drops : 5% Zammy Peices , 10% Zammy Robes , 9.9% Guthan Warspear , 10% Ahrim Staff , 5% Boaters (all colors) , 0.1% Green Phat
[ul][li]Infernal Mage[/li][/ul]
Hp- 150 Drops: Wizzy Clothes (4.8%) , Wizzy G (10%) , Wizzy T (10%) , Ancients Staff (15%) , 200gp (60.9%) , Yellow Phat (0.1%)
[ul][li]Ice Queen[/li][/ul]
Hp- 200 Drops- Skeletal (Best Range Armour) (5% chance) , Ghostly (Best Mage Armour)(5% chance) , Blue Partyhat (0.1%) , Red Partyhat (0.1%) , White Partyhat (0.1%) , Purple Partyhat (0.1%) , Red H'ween Mask (0.1%) , Blue H'ween Mask (0.1%) , Green H'ween Mask (0.1%)
[ul][li]Hellhound[/li][/ul]
Hp- 165 Drops- Mystic (Blue and Red) 60% chance (all parts) , Mage amulet (5%) , Seers Ring (5%) , 100 dragon bones (10%) , Archer Ring (19.9%) , Santa Hat (0.1%)
~ REMEMBER THIS SERVER IS STILL BETA ! ~
~ I HAVE ALL THE HELP I NEED AND ALL THE ADMINS HAVE BEEN GIVEN ADMIN AND SAME WITH MODS SO DO NOT ASK PLEASE! ~
~Server ip is Phatscapebeta.no-ip.biz~
~Port is 5555~
REMEMBER TO REGISTER AT www.phatkillerz.net.ms/
HAVE FUN ITS ON!!! :D
~Ice Blu Phat [/list]

item.title: Project Phatscape
item.dc:creator: @ersertaz ersertaz
item.description:
@ersertaz wrote:

i had over 100 members on the server then the server got banned and no1 has came on since :([br][size=1]Posted on: August 30, 2007, 04:11:56 PM[/size][hr]almost done with everything. Creds go to Me and Jedi for coding

Read full topic

item.title: Project Phatscape
item.dc:creator: @Jedi_zephyr Jedi_zephyr
item.description:
@Jedi_zephyr wrote:

Yeah, it’s one of the best server’s out there. Better than dodian IMO. Dodian is highly populated, but
He doesn’t bother to rid of some easy glitches, like the Hair bug for example.

its not an advertisement… its me letting everyone know its a server im gonna work hard on.
